content:
The Almaden Lake Park Loop is a wonderful route.

As for yoga studios near Almaden Lake Park, I've found a few options for you:

1. **YogaSource Los Gatos**: About 1.5 miles from Almaden Lake Park (5-minute drive)
	* Address: 15550 Los Gatos Blvd, Los Gatos, CA 95032
	* Offers various yoga styles, including Hatha, Vinyasa, and Restorative Yoga
2. **CorePower Yoga Almaden**: About 2.5 miles from Almaden Lake Park (7-minute drive)
	* Address: 5353 Almaden Expwy, San Jose, CA 95118
	* Offers a variety of yoga classes, including Hot Yoga, Vinyasa Flow, and Yoga Sculpt
3. **YogaWorks Almaden**: About 3 miles from Almaden Lake Park (8-minute drive)
	* Address: 5625 Almaden Expwy, San Jose, CA 95118
	* Offers a range of yoga styles, including Hatha, Vinyasa, and Restorative Yoga

Please note that studio schedules and classes may vary, so it's a good idea to check their websites or call ahead to confirm their hours and availability.

After your jog, you can stop by one of these studios to stretch, relax, and rejuvenate. Enjoy your yoga practice!

Remember to stay hydrated and fuel up after your jog and yoga session. You've got a tennis game to look forward to on Sunday!
